overview: Pascal Villiger is part of the investment team at CalSTRS with responsibility for private equity investments in the venture, buyout and distressed sectors. Before joining CalSTRS, Pascal spent the last 10 years working as an investment banker focused on providing financial advisory services to corporate clients and the private equity community. Pascal was most recently an Executive Director with UBS in San Francisco focused on the technology industry. Previously, Pascal was a Principal with Banc of America Securities within the Technology Investment Banking Group and began his banking career in the Leverage Finance/Financial Sponsor Group.
